body_content.explanation: in basketball, a way of playing in which players put pressure on the opposing team in all areas of the court (= playing area), not just near the opposition basket:
examples: The team uses a suffocating full-court press to win by 31 points.

body_content.explanation: a situation in which a person or organization makes a lot of effort to try to achieve something :
examples: They mounted a full-court press against the proposed regulations.
Broadcasters put a full court press on Congress to overturn the plan.
